long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quran Murajaah is an application to help Muslims to easily memorize and review the verses of the Quran.

Quran Murajaah features allows users to save selected specific surahs and verses then showing the verse every time you open a new tab. By repeatedly showing specific verse, it will help user to read, memorize and review the verse.

Features:
- Save Selected Specific Surahs and Verse to memorize
- Detail chapter name, translation, chapter number and place of Surahs revealed
- Transliteration of verse
- Verse Translation
